entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Open up the internal EndpointHtmlRenderer for integrating frameworks #51148
  • Confirmation email sent after registering user via Identity API has link with relative path, should be only code #51146
  • Integration Testing returns 404 for all HTTP requests that work with curl/Postman #51143
  • ComponentBase.BuildRenderTree cannot be overriden but I need to override, unless there's alternate #51140
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_Login_Usability: Placeholder text for email and password field is not visible in normal mode. #51135
  • SectionContent doesn't work correctly with render modes #51132
    8.0.0
  • .Net8 Identity with ef core #51129
  • [Blazor] It's not possible to use JavaScript for state management when using Static Render Mode. #51128
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_login_Non-Text Contrast :Color contrast ratio of "Remember me" checkbox is (1.819:1) which is less than required 3:1 #51127
    8.0.0
  • [Blazor] In static render mode, scripts are not loaded onto the page after navigation. #51126
  • WebHost doesn't detect ASPNETCORE_HTTP_PORTS #51125
  • Allow IUserValidator.ValidateAsync return IdentityResult.Failed() without IdentityError #51123
  • Canceled request to .NET 8 RC 1 running on Azure AppService IIS InProcess hosting model causes ThreadPool Starvation #51121

Closed

  • Backport the fix from #43844 to .NET 6 LTS #43925
    6.0.12
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #51090
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51124
  • [Blazor Server] Missing Event Callback Parameters Does Not Throw Errors. #51097
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #49909
    8.0.0
  • Enhanced form submit to a different internal URL doesn't update browser location #50945
    8.0.0
  • Allow middleware routing manipulation in blazor #45653
    Backlog
  • Add Testing to BlazorWasmDebugging VSCode Extension #46483
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Document addition of Empty Blazor projects #46487
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Cannot select .net 8 preview 6 in Blazor Server even though installed. #49446
    .NET 9 Planning
  • SignalR Client client-to-server streaming is memory leaking in ConnectionState.UploadStreamToken #50913
  • Add [RenderModeStatic] attribute #51102
  • Support DateOnly with InputDate #51045
    8.0.0
  • IIS hosting. AspNetCoreModuleV2. NullReferenceException when SignalR socket disconnected #51105
  • Pass the circuit from the server to the client in Blazor Web for RenderModeServer #51053
  • Blazor Custom Elements Documentation Vanished #47273
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_IndividualAuth_NoHttps_Works_WithOutLocalDB #47919
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] CascadingModelBinder rework. #48454
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Restore ability to compress all files during dotnet publish for Blazor wasm applications #46603
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] ComponentStatePersistenceManager needs to ensure the app has finished rendering #47025
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #51110
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51111

PullRequests

Created

  • MockTimeProvider -> FakeTimeProvider #51147
    area-networking
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51145
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51139
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51138
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51137
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr
  • Added .vtt MIME type to text/vtt #51136
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    area-mvc
  • OutputCache - use ref-counting on OutputCacheEntry to ensure that buffers are fully recycled #51131
    area-perf, feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware
  • [Blazor] Emit action attribute when not explicit. #51130
    area-blazor
  • Change HealthCheckPublisherHostedService exception log from debug to error #51120
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix `DragDrop_CanTrigger()` flakiness #51142
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 6.0.24
  • Update branding to 6.0.24 #51115
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8a6feab` to `e47544a` #51049
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • [release/7.0] Fix `DragDrop_CanTrigger()` flakiness #51141
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 7.0.13
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8a6feab` to `e47544a` #51051
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • Update branding to 7.0.13 #51116
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • Update milestones for November servicing #51144
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Push history entry after enhanced submit with method=get #51013
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51117
    area-signalr, feature-client-net, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #51059
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Rename metrics tag exception.type to error.type #51084
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0.0
  • Use token expiration value from options as fallback #51113
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement, area-networking
  • Refactor problem details exception handler #51114
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web 2.13.4 #50594
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
